description:
Aikatsu Stars! features the protagonist Yume Nijino. Yume aims to become a top idol, and she enrolls in the Yotsuboshi Gakuen. This academy has a special group called the S4, who are the top four active idols in the school. Yume and the other first-year students aim to become a part of the S4.

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)
hashtag: #アイカツ #aikatsu #アイカツスターズ

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Dancing
tags.description: Centers around the art of dance.

tags.name: Henshin
tags.description: Prominently features character or costume transformations which often grant special abilities.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Musical Theater
tags.description: Features a performance that combines songs, spoken dialogue, acting, and dance.

tags.name: Ships
tags.description: Prominently features the use of sea-based transportation vessels.

tags.name: Card Battle
tags.description: Centers around individuals competing in card games.

tags.name: Cars
tags.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

tags.name: Football
tags.description: Centers around the sport of football (known in the USA as "soccer").

tags.name: Chibi
tags.description: Features "super deformed" character designs with smaller, rounder proportions and a cute look.
